TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SocketPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class SocketPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class SocketPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type SocketPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制在傳輸位址上進行或接受連接的權限。

span.span: Controls rights to make or accept connections on a transport address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體的 control 權限，以接受連線，或起始連線。 instances control permission to accept connections or initiate connections. A權限可建立的主機名稱或 IP 位址、 連接埠號碼和傳輸通訊協定。A permission can be established for a host name or IP address, a port number, and a transport protocol. > [!NOTE] > 請避免建立使用主機名稱，因為這些名稱必須解析為 IP 位址，這可能會封鎖堆疊的通訊端權限。Avoid creating socket permissions using host names, as these names have to be resolved to IP addresses, and this might block the stack. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別來設定、 變更和強制執行各種不同的通訊端存取限制。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to set, change, and enforce various socket access restrictions. [!code-cpp[SocketPermissionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SocketPermissionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SocketPermissionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPermissionExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that allows unrestricted access to the or disallows access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以建立執行個體`Unrestricted`值從則執行個體將傳遞所有的需求。If the instance is created with the `Unrestricted` value from then the instance passes all demands. 任何其他值`state`會導致會失敗的所有要求，除非加上的傳輸位址的權限的執行個體。Any other value for `state` results in a instance that fails all demands unless a transport address permission is added with . ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用列舉值。The following example creates a using a enumerated value. [!code-cpp[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/CPP/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/CS/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[dateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DateClient_SocketPermission_Constructor/VB/dateclient_socketpermission_constructor.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the given transport address with the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立控制存取來指定`hostName`並`portNumber`使用指定`transport`。This constructor creates a that controls access to the specified `hostName` and `portNumber` using the specified `transport`. `hostName`可以是 DNS 名稱、 IP 位址或指定的 IP 子網路，例如 192.168.1.\*。The `hostName` can be a DNS name, an IP address, or a specified IP subnet, such as 192.168.1.\*. `portNumber`可以是任何傳輸，所定義的有效連接埠號碼或。The `portNumber` can be any valid port number defined by the transport, or . ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用列舉值，列舉值、 主機名稱和連接埠號碼。The following example creates a using a enumerated value, a enumerated value, the hostname, and the port number. remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集是權限，可協助保護的資源與這兩個權限所保護的作業。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that helps to protect the resources and operations protected by both permissions. 具體來說，它代表的最低權限，使得任何傳遞兩個權限的需求也會將它們的交集。Specifically, it represents the minimum permission such that any demand that passes both permissions also passes their intersection. 這個方法會覆寫並實作以支援介面。This method overrides and is implemented to support the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以取得兩個邏輯交集執行個體。The following example uses the method to obtain a logical intersection between two instances. span.span: If is not , this method returns if the current instance defines a subset of permissions; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的使用權限會指定一組完全包含在指定的權限的作業，目前的使用權限是指定的權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示 192.168.1.1:80 的存取權限是 192.168.1.1: any，表示存取權限的子集。For example, a permission that represents access to 192.168.1.1:80 is a subset of a permission that represents access to 192.168.1.1:Any. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來判斷一個是另一個子集。The following example uses the method to determine if one is the subset of another.
